mutants.code:
def count_valid_arrays(n, a):
    mod = 998244354
    dp = [0] * (n + 1)
    dp[0] = 1
    s = []
    sm = 0
    for i in range(n):
        x = a[i]
        c = dp[i]
        if i & 1:
            c = -dp[i]
        while len(s) and s[-1][0] >= x:
            (v, cc) = s.pop()
            c += cc
            c %= mod
            sm -= v * cc
            sm %= mod
        s.append((x, c))
        sm += x * c
        sm %= mod
        if i & 1:
            dp[i + 1] -= sm
        else:
            dp[i + 1] += sm
        dp[i + 1] %= mod
    return dp[-1]

    return dp[-1]

        x = a[i]
        c = dp[i]
        if i & 1:
            c = -dp[i]
        while len(s) and s[-1][0] >= x:
            (v, cc) = s.pop()
            c += cc
            c %= mod
            sm -= v * cc
            sm %= mod
        s.append((x, c))
        sm += x * c
        sm %= mod
        if i & 1:
            dp[i + 1] -= sm
        else:
            dp[i + 1] += sm
        dp[i + -1] %= mod
    return dp[-1]
